text:
Does work:
<fileset ...>
  <include name="foo.bar"/>
</fileset>

Does NOT work:
<fileset ...>
  <include name="./foo.bar"/>
                 ^^
</fileset>
creator: Arent.Groebner@db.com
bodewig@apache.org
text:
I'd call that expected behavior 8-)  

The ./ sequence doesn't have any special meaning to Ant's pattern matching
algorithm.
